metadata.titleCn: 苏门答腊俯冲带三维温度场和岩石相变分布（2001-2010）
metadata.description: The data includes the three-dimensional temperature field (degrees Celsius), water content (wt%), dehydration rate (wt%/km), rock phase change distribution, and subduction velocity field (cm/yr) of the subducting plate, as well as the coastline and volcano distribution in southern and southwestern Alaska. The data coordinates are temporarily an orthogonal coordinate system, where the origin of the coordinates is (98.10E, 2.40S), the x+ azimuth is 230 degrees clockwise from the north, the y+ azimuth is 140 degrees clockwise from the north, and the z+ direction is vertical downwards, in kilometers. The data source method is a three-dimensional finite-difference numerical simulation. The geophysical calculation is ensured after the subduction thermal regime reaches a steady state. The temperature field error range is ±10 degrees Celsius, and the velocity field error range is ±0.1cm/ yr. This data can be used to further analyze the geophysical field of the subduction zone.
metadata.descriptionCn: 本数据包括苏门答腊下方俯冲板块的三维温度场（摄氏度），含水率（wt%），脱水率（wt%/km）、岩石相变分布，俯冲速度场（cm/yr），海岸线和火山分布等。数据坐标暂为直角坐标系，其中坐标原点为 （98.10E, 2.40S），x+方向为北起顺时针230度，y+方向为北起顺时针140度，z+方向为垂直向下，单位公里。数据来源方法为三维有限差分数值模拟，俯冲达到稳态后的物理计算值。其中温度场误差范围为±10摄氏度，速度场误差范围为±0.1cm/yr。该数据可用于对该俯冲带的地球物理场分析。

background: The Sumatra convergent plate boundary accommodates noticeable oblique convergence between the Sunda and Indian-Australian plates. The oblique subduction associated strike-slip motion in the Sumatra-Andaman sector has contributed to the formation of a seismically fragile sliver plate between the subduction margin and a complex fault system. According to the United States Geological Survey, at least 40 great earthquakes have damaged coastal Sumatra, including Mw7.9 (Enggano, 2000 June), Mw9.1 (Sumatra-Andaman, 2004 December), Mw8.6 (Nias-Simeulue, 2005 March), Mw8.4 (2007 September), Mw7.9 (2007 September), and Mw7.8 (Banyak, 2010 April) earthquakes. The 1833 earthquake has been estimated to be Mw9.0 using records of uplift taken from coral microatolls. Most of these giant earthquakes are associated with devastating tsunamis. Over the past half century, the major convergent strains in the area were released, according to the vertical level of the microatolls. The large thrust off of the shore of coastal Sumatra is predominantly less than 40 km deep, and it slipped more than 20 m in the 2004 Mw9.1 earthquake. Coral microatoll records also reveal a 15-year-long reversal of interseismic vertical displacement from subsidence to uplift between 1966 and 1981, which reflects 15-year-long slow-slip events (SSEs) on the Sunda megathrust near Banyak Island, with multidecade geodetic records showing the full spectrum of slip behavior. Tectonic tremors are also found in close association with geodetically observed SSE occurrence on the Banyak Islands of North Sumatra, as revealed by coral observations.
research objective: In this study, we focus on fast and slow earthquakes and their thermohydrous states in the Sumatran tectonic complex based on 3-D numerical simulation. The joint effects of metamorphized rocks of the incoming plate on the generation of fast and slow earthquakes beneath Sumatra are also investigated.
methods: By combining the updated geometry of the incoming plate through seismic tomography (Slab 2.0, Hayes et al., 2018) and using surface heat flow observations (Pollack et al., 1993) and the estimate from the Curie point depth (Li et al., 2017) as constraints, we constructed a 3-D thermomechanical model developed from code Stag3D (Tackley & Xie, 2003) to predict the Sumatran thermal and hydrous states to better understand the Sunda megathrust subduction thermodynamics. The model evolves over time simultaneously with plate subduction and specifically computes temperature variation, water content, and slab dehydration; then, the model results are compared with earthquake distribution. We performed sensitivity tests to investigate the robustness of our modeling results and varied the mantle viscosity from 0.9 × 10^20 to 1.1 × 10^20 Pa s, and mantle density from 3,250 to 3,350 kg/m^3.
findings: The temperature of earthquake-stricken Sumatra megathrust varies from 200°C to 500°C in a cross-arc width of approximately 50–150 km determined by a changing dip angle. Slab dehydration of the water-rich MORB and ultramafic rocks in the oceanic lithosphere beneath Sumatra releases a large amount of fluid into the continental wedge. The fluids derived from slab dehydration are prone to upwelling following the subduction channel along the plate interface and thus contribute to the large earthquakes clustered directly updip of the dehydration front, posing an abundant fluid interface and high seismic risk beneath offshore Sumatra. The dehydration front in the subducted upper lithosphere at a depth of approximately 30–60 km produces fast and slow earthquakes, while the subducted lower lithosphere at a depth of approximately 80–120 km influences arc magmatism.
backgroundCn: 苏门答腊汇聚板块边界适应于巽他板块和印度-澳大利亚板块之间明显的斜向汇聚。与斜向俯冲相关的走滑运动在苏门答腊-安达曼地区形成了一个地震脆弱的碎片板块，该碎片板块位于俯冲边缘和复杂的断层系统之间。根据美国地质调查局的数据，至少有40次大地震对沿海苏门答腊造成了损害，包括Mw7.9（恩干诺，2000年6月）、Mw9.1（苏门答腊-安达曼，2004年12月）、Mw8.6（尼亚斯-西梅卢，2005年3月）、Mw8.4（2007年9月）、Mw7.9（2007年9月）和Mw7.8（班亚克，2010年4月）等地震。1833年的地震估计为Mw9.0，使用了从珊瑚微环礁获得的抬升记录。这些巨型地震大多与毁灭性的海啸相关。在过去的半个世纪里，该地区的主要汇聚应变已根据微环礁的垂直水平释放。沿苏门答腊沿海的巨大推覆主要深度不足40公里，并且在2004年Mw9.1地震中滑动超过20米。珊瑚微环礁记录还揭示了1966年至1981年间，间歇性垂直位移从沉降到抬升的15年反转，这反映了在班亚克岛附近的巽他大断层上发生的15年慢滑事件（SSE），而多年代的测地记录显示了滑动行为的全谱。地震颤动也与在北苏门答腊班亚克岛上观测到的测地慢滑事件的发生密切相关，这一点通过珊瑚观察得以揭示。
research objectiveCn: 在本研究中，我们关注于苏门答腊构造复合体中快速和慢速地震及其热水状态，基于三维数值模拟。还研究了进入板块的变质岩对苏门答腊下方快速和慢速地震生成的联合影响。
methodsCn: 通过结合来自地震层析成像的更新板块几何（Slab 2.0，Hayes等，2018）和表面热流观测（Pollack等，1993）以及来自居里点深度的估计（Li等，2017）作为约束，我们构建了一个基于Stag3D代码（Tackley & Xie，2003）的三维热机械模型，以预测苏门答腊的热状态和水分状态，从而更好地理解巽他弧俯冲的热力学。该模型随着时间的推移同时模拟板块俯冲，并具体计算温度变化、水分含量和板块脱水；然后将模型结果与地震分布进行比较。我们进行了灵敏度测试，以调查模型结果的稳健性，并将地幔粘度从0.9 × 10^20到1.1 × 10^20 Pa s，以及地幔密度从3,250到3,350 kg/m^3进行了变化。
findingsCn: 地震受灾的苏门答腊大断层的温度变化范围为200°C至500°C，横跨约50-150公里的区域，受变化的倾角影响。海洋岩石圈下的富水中洋脊玄武岩（MORB）和超基性岩石的板块脱水释放出大量流体进入大陆楔。来自板块脱水的流体容易沿着板块界面的俯冲通道上升，因此在脱水前沿直接上游聚集的大地震中，形成了丰富的流体界面，并在苏门答腊海域下方造成了高地震风险。位于约30-60公里深度的被俯冲上部岩石圈的脱水前沿产生快速和缓慢地震，而位于约80-120公里深度的被俯冲下部岩石圈则影响弧岩浆活动。

Definition.QuestionEn: What is a 3-D finite difference numerical simulation in the context of geophysical data collection?
Definition.QuestionCn: 三维有限差分数值模拟在地球物理数据采集中的背景是什么。
Definition.AnswerEn: A 3-D finite difference numerical simulation is a computational approach used to model complex physical phenomena, such as the temperature field and rock phase changes in a subduction zone. It involves discretizing the physical space into a grid and solving the equations governing the physical processes at each grid point over time. This method enables researchers to predict and analyze the geophysical characteristics of regions like the Sumatra subduction zone, providing insights into temperature variation, water content, and slab dehydration.
Definition.AnswerCn: 三维有限差分数值模拟是一种计算方法，用于模拟复杂的物理现象，例如俯冲带中的温度场和岩石相变。该方法涉及将物理空间离散化为网格，并在每个网格点上随时间求解支配物理过程的方程。这种方法使研究人员能够预测和分析像苏门答腊俯冲带这样的区域的地球物理特征，提供关于温度变化、水分含量和板块脱水的见解。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How does the method of using 3-D finite difference numerical simulation to generate a temperature field compare to using seismic tomography for understanding subduction zone thermodynamics?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 使用三维有限差分数值模拟生成温度场的方法与使用地震层析成像理解俯冲带热力学的方法相比，如何？
Comparison.AnswerEn: The 3-D finite difference numerical simulation provides a direct calculation of the temperature field, taking into account the thermohydrous state over time, whereas seismic tomography offers a geometrical update of the incoming plate, which can serve as a constraint for models predicting temperature variations. Both methods complement each other, with tomography providing structural insights and numerical simulations offering dynamic thermal and hydrous state predictions.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 三维有限差分数值模拟直接计算温度场，考虑了随时间变化的热水状态，而地震层析成像则提供了入侵板块的几何更新，这可以作为预测温度变化模型的约束。这两种方法相辅相成，层析成像提供结构性见解，而数值模拟则提供动态的热和水状态预测。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors contribute to the occurrence of both fast and slow earthquakes in the Sumatran tectonic complex?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 导致苏门答腊构造复合体中发生快速和慢速地震的因素有哪些？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The occurrence of both fast and slow earthquakes in the Sumatran tectonic complex is influenced by the thermal and hydrous states of the area, slab dehydration processes, and the fluid dynamics along the plate interface. The distribution of fluids and the dehydration front's position relative to the subduction zone play significant roles in earthquake generation.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 在苏门答腊构造复合体中，快速和缓慢地震的发生受到该地区热状态和含水状态、板块脱水过程以及板块界面流体动力学的影响。流体的分布和脱水前沿相对于俯冲带的位置在地震生成中起着重要作用。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential consequences of integrating 3-D numerical simulation results with seismic tomography on our understanding of earthquake dynamics in subduction zones?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 将三维数值模拟结果与地震层析成像相结合，对我们理解俯冲带的地震动态可能产生的潜在后果是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Integrating 3-D numerical simulation results with seismic tomography can enhance our understanding of earthquake dynamics by providing a detailed model of the thermal and hydrous states. This can reveal how temperature variations and slab dehydration affect earthquake generation, potentially uncovering the role of fluids in the seismic risk beneath offshore Sumatra.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 将三维数值模拟结果与地震层析成像相结合，可以增强我们对地震动态的理解，提供热状态和水合状态的详细模型。这可以揭示温度变化和板块脱水如何影响地震的产生，潜在地揭示流体在苏门答腊海域下方地震风险中的作用。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What could be the implications of varying mantle viscosity and density in sensitivity tests for understanding the robustness of subduction models?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 在敏感性测试中，变化的地幔粘度和密度对理解俯冲模型的稳健性可能产生的影响是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Varying mantle viscosity and density in sensitivity tests allows researchers to evaluate the robustness of subduction models by examining how these parameters influence temperature and fluid distribution. Such tests can help determine the stability of model predictions and identify critical factors affecting earthquake and magmatic processes.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 通过在敏感性测试中改变地幔的粘度和密度，研究人员可以评估俯冲模型的稳健性，检查这些参数如何影响温度和流体分布。这些测试有助于确定模型预测的稳定性，并识别影响地震和岩浆过程的关键因素。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: Why is it important to use 3-D numerical simulation when investigating the thermohydrous states of tectonic complexes like the Sumatran subduction zone?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在研究像苏门答腊俯冲带这样的构造复合体的热流体状态时，使用三维数值模拟的重要性是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: 3-D numerical simulation is crucial to accurately model and understand the thermal and hydrous states of the Sumatran tectonic complex, as it allows for the detailed prediction of temperature variations, water content, and slab dehydration processes that are integral to understanding the subduction thermodynamics and their role in earthquake generation.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 三维数值模拟对于准确建模和理解苏门答腊构造复合体的热状态和水分状态至关重要，因为它能够详细预测温度变化、水分含量和板块脱水过程，这些都是理解俯冲热力学及其在地震生成中的作用的关键。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: Why is it necessary to perform sensitivity tests by varying mantle viscosity and density in the development of a thermomechanical model for the Sumatran subduction zone?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在开发苏门答腊俯冲带的热机械模型时，为什么有必要通过改变地幔粘度和密度来进行敏感性测试？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: Performing sensitivity tests by varying mantle viscosity and density is necessary to assess the robustness and reliability of the thermomechanical model, ensuring that the predictions remain consistent under different geophysical conditions and providing a comprehensive understanding of the factors influencing the thermodynamics of the subduction process.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 通过改变地幔粘度和密度进行敏感性测试是必要的，以评估热机械模型的稳健性和可靠性，确保在不同地球物理条件下预测结果保持一致，并提供对影响俯冲过程热力学因素的全面理解。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What procedural methods are employed to construct a 3-D temperature field model for subduction zones, and how do they ensure accuracy in temperature prediction?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 构建俯冲带三维温度场模型所采用的程序方法有哪些，以及它们如何确保温度预测的准确性？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: To construct a 3-D temperature field model for subduction zones, seismic tomography is used for updating the geometry of the incoming plate, and constraints from surface heat flow observations and estimates from the Curie point depth are applied. The model is developed using the Stag3D code to predict the thermal and hydrous states, with sensitivity tests conducted to ensure robustness and accuracy.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 为了构建俯冲带的三维温度场模型，使用地震层析成像更新入侵板块的几何形状，并应用来自地表热流观测和库里点深度估计的约束。该模型使用Stag3D代码开发，以预测热状态和水合状态，并进行灵敏度测试以确保模型的稳健性和准确性。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What methodologies enable the accurate simulation of three-dimensional temperature fields and phase transitions in subduction zones?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些方法论能够准确模拟俯冲带中的三维温度场和相变？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The use of three-dimensional finite difference numerical simulation methods enables the accurate simulation of temperature fields and phase transitions in subduction zones, with the model evolving over time simultaneously with plate subduction and computing temperature variation, water content, and slab dehydration.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 三维有限差分数值模拟方法的使用能够准确模拟俯冲带中的温度场和相变，模型随着时间的推移同时演化，计算板块俯冲过程中的温度变化、水分含量和板块脱水。

Enablement.QuestionEn: How does the integration of seismic tomography and surface heat flow observations enable a comprehensive understanding of subduction zone dynamics?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 地震层析成像与地表热流观测的结合如何使我们对俯冲带动力学有更全面的理解？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The integration of seismic tomography and surface heat flow observations provides constraints that enable the construction of a detailed 3-D thermomechanical model, helping to predict the thermal and hydrous states in subduction zones and understand subduction thermodynamics.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 地震层析成像与地表热流观测的结合提供了约束条件，使得能够构建详细的三维热机械模型，帮助预测俯冲带的热状态和水分状态，并理解俯冲热力学。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What factors contribute to the enhanced accuracy of predicting earthquake distribution in subduction zones through numerical simulations?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些因素有助于通过数值模拟提高对俯冲带地震分布的预测准确性？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Factors contributing to enhanced accuracy include the updated geometry of the incoming plate from seismic tomography, the constraints from surface heat flow observations, and sensitivity tests performed by varying mantle viscosity and density, which help in comparing model results with earthquake distributions.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 增强准确性的因素包括来自地震层析成像的更新入射板几何形状、来自地表热流观测的约束，以及通过改变地幔粘度和密度进行的敏感性测试，这有助于将模型结果与地震分布进行比较。

Expectation.QuestionEn: What expectations could lead researchers to focus on the dehydration processes in subducting plates when studying earthquake generation beneath Sumatra?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 研究人员在研究苏门答腊下方的地震生成时，可能会关注俯冲板块中的脱水过程，这背后的期望是什么？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Researchers may expect that dehydration processes play a critical role in earthquake generation due to the release of fluids from subducted oceanic lithosphere, which can affect seismicity by influencing the mechanical properties of the subduction interface and contributing to fluid upwelling. This expectation is grounded in the understanding that fluid presence is a significant factor in seismic risk assessment.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 研究人员可能预计，脱水过程在地震生成中发挥着关键作用，因为从俯冲的海洋岩石圈释放的流体可以通过影响俯冲界面的机械性质并促进流体上升来影响地震活动。这一预期基于对流体存在是地震风险评估中一个重要因素的理解。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: How would you evaluate the effectiveness of using 3-D finite difference numerical simulation as a data collection method for understanding the Sumatra subduction zone thermodynamics?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 您将如何评估使用三维有限差分数值模拟作为数据收集方法，以理解苏门答腊俯冲带热力学的有效性？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The use of 3-D finite difference numerical simulation is effective for understanding the Sumatra subduction zone thermodynamics as it allows for detailed modeling of temperature variations, water content, and slab dehydration in a complex geological setting. This method provides a comprehensive approach to simulate the physical conditions at depth, offering insights that can be correlated with earthquake distribution and other geophysical phenomena.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 三维有限差分数值模拟在理解苏门答腊俯冲带热力学方面是有效的，因为它可以详细模拟复杂地质环境中的温度变化、水分含量和板块脱水。这种方法提供了一种全面的方式来模拟深处的物理条件，提供了可以与地震分布和其他地球物理现象相关联的见解。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I don't understand how a dataset can effectively represent the thermohydrous states and seismic risks in complex tectonic settings like the Sumatra subduction zone.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不明白一个数据集如何能够有效地代表像苏门答腊俯冲带这样复杂构造环境中的热水状态和地震风险。
Assertion.AnswerEn: By using 3-D numerical simulation and constraints from seismic tomography and surface heat flow observations, it is possible to construct a detailed thermomechanical model that predicts thermal and hydrous states, which helps in understanding seismic risks in tectonic settings like the Sumatra subduction zone.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 通过使用三维数值模拟以及来自地震层析成像和地表热流观测的约束，可以构建一个详细的热机械模型，该模型预测热状态和含水状态，有助于理解像苏门答腊俯冲带这样的构造环境中的地震风险。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I can't make sense of how a dataset could capture the dynamic processes like slab dehydration and fluid upwelling along subduction channels.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我无法理解一个数据集如何能够捕捉到像板块脱水和沿俯冲通道的流体上升这样的动态过程。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Slab dehydration and fluid upwelling along subduction channels can be captured in a dataset by modeling the subduction process over time using computational tools like Stag3D, which considers temperature variation, water content, and slab dehydration to simulate these dynamic processes.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 沿俯冲通道的板块脱水和流体上涌可以通过建模俯冲过程随时间变化的数据集来捕捉，使用像Stag3D这样的计算工具，该工具考虑温度变化、水分含量和板块脱水，以模拟这些动态过程。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please explore possible methodologies for collecting three-dimensional temperature field data and rock phase transition distribution in a subduction zone.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请探讨在俯冲带中收集三维温度场数据和岩石相变分布的可能方法。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: The three-dimensional temperature field and rock phase transition distribution in a subduction zone can be collected using three-dimensional finite difference numerical simulations. This method involves simulating the subduction process until it reaches a steady state and calculating the physical parameters, such as temperature, water content, and dehydration rates. These simulations require constraints from seismic tomography, surface heat flow observations, and estimates from Curie point depth to build accurate models.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 在俯冲带中，三维温度场和岩石相变分布可以通过三维有限差分数值模拟进行收集。这种方法涉及模拟俯冲过程，直到达到稳态，并计算物理参数，如温度、水分含量和脱水速率。这些模拟需要来自地震层析成像、地表热流观测和库里点深度估计的约束，以构建准确的模型。
